entries.title: Other Publications - BCEAO
entries.text: Published in 2000 in three volumes, this work aims to enlighten the reader on the construction of the monetary system of the countries forming the WAMU.

entries.title: Instruments of Monetary Policy Implementation - BCEAO
entries.text: The current mechanism for the management of the currency and credit relies on market mechanisms and indirect tools to regulate liquidity.

entries.title: The Monetary Policy Committee | BCEAO
entries.text: The Monetary Policy Committee is responsible for defining monetary policy within WAMU, and its instruments, in line with the provisions of the Statutes.
